books.title: Ukridge Stories
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A collection of stories featuring P. G. Wodehouse’s charismatic character Stanley Featherstonehaugh Ukridge.

books.title: Riders of the Purple Sage
books.author: Zane Grey
books.summary: On a ranch in southern Utah, Jane Withersteen refuses to marry a local church elder, and together with her ranch hand and a mysterious gunman she must face retaliatory violence, theft, and murder.

books.title: Wonderful Adventures of Mrs. Seacole in Many Lands
books.author: Mary Seacole
books.summary: A British Creole woman provides medical assistance during the Crimean War after her travels around Panama.

books.title: A General History of the Pirates
books.author: Captain Charles Johnson
books.summary: The lives and stories of the daring pirate outlaws who terrorized the Atlantic Ocean and Caribbean Sea in the 18th century.

books.title: The Enchanted Castle
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Three children discover a wonderful garden and castle, and come into possession of a magic ring which entangles them in many strange adventures.

books.title: Three Men in a Boat
books.author: Jerome K. Jerome
books.summary: The humorous travelogue of a boating holiday down the Thames taken by three friends and their dog.

books.title: The Trachiniae
books.author: Sophocles
books.summary: A woman unintentionally kills her demigod husband with a poisoned robe in a desperate attempt to reclaim his love.

books.title: Lilith
books.author: George MacDonald
books.summary: After inheriting his ancestral home, a young man discovers another world inside his library and embarks on an allegorical journey.

books.title: Waverley
books.author: Walter Scott
books.summary: A young English officer becomes involved in the Jacobite rebellion.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Henry Kuttner
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Henry Kuttner, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: The Interesting Narrative of the Life of Olaudah Equiano
books.author: Olaudah Equiano
books.summary: An autobiography of an ex-slave in the mid 1700s.

books.title: The Insidious Dr. Fu-Manchu
books.author: Sax Rohmer
books.summary: An intrepid detective hunts the criminal mastermind Fu-Manchu through early 20th-century London.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: The Kingdom of God Is Within You
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.summary: Tolstoy describes true Christianity as a non-hierarchical, nonviolent, non-coercive pursuit, and criticizes institutional Christianity as a deceptive corruption.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Ambrose Bierce
books.summary: A collection of Ambrose Bierce’s poetry.

books.title: The Indiscreet Jewels
books.author: Denis Diderot
books.summary: The Sultan of the Congo brings about philosophical inquiry and scandal when he is granted a magical ring that permits him to compel speech from the vaginas of the women of his court.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Mack Reynolds
books.summary: A collection of science fiction short stories by Mack Reynolds ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Hjalmar Söderberg
books.summary: A collection of Hjalmar Söderberg’s short stories, ordered by date of their translation.

books.title: The Divine Comedy
books.author: Dante Alighieri
books.summary: Dante journeys through Hell, Purgatory, and Heaven in order to receive salvation and to find divine love.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.
